dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname! I'm certain that your duties with the Maelstromthe Order of the Twin Adderthe Immortal Flames demand much of your time already, but if I might have a word?

dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: I'll get right to the point, [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank]. The higher-ups have authorized plans to form a specialized squad and we're on the lookout for a reliable leader. Your name was at the top of the list.

dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: You would be responsible for training and commanding a number of adventurer subordinates, and the position also comes with the possibility of further promotion. What say you, [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank]? Are you ready to lead?

dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: Ah. Well, that's not the response I was hoping for, but it's best we're all honest here. A hesitant commander is a danger to herhis own troops.

dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: Outstanding! Let's get you acquainted with your second-in-command right away.

dialogue.name: PLATOONINSTRUCTOR
dialogue.text: It's an honor to be serving with you, [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname! In my capacity as your aide, I'll be filling the role of squadron sergeant.

dialogue.name: PLATOONINSTRUCTOR
dialogue.text: And these eager troopers are the inaugural members of our squadron. Form up!

dialogue.name: PLATOONINSTRUCTOR
dialogue.text: Every one of them is a fledgling adventurer who enlisted in the hopes of following in your legendary footsteps. They're green to the military, aye, but we'll harden them up soon enough.

dialogue.name: PLATOONINSTRUCTOR
dialogue.text: When you've a moment to spare, stop by the barracks and we can discuss their training and deployment in greater detail.

dialogue.name: PLATOONINSTRUCTOR
dialogue.text: I'll leave you to it, then, Commander.

dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: What do you think? I'll admit they're raw as soldiers go, but they certainly have potential. I look forward to seeing what you can do with them.

dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: Right, I won't keep you any longer. Your squad's barracks can be found through the door at the back of the command roomAdders' NestHall of Flames.

dialogue.name: FLAMEPERSONNEL
dialogue.text: May the Navigator guide you to victorythe Matron watch over youNald'thal bless you with fortune!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
You are now the commander of an adventurer squadron!
Enter the MaelstromTwin AdderFlame Barracks and speak with your squadron sergeant to issue deployment orders.
